attributes.action: Make Forgeworld/Games workshop update the Tau Orca and release a new model.
attributes.additional_details: The orca was a really cool vetol ship that every tau player wished they could have but always put off buying one, then they were lost forever. Change needs to happen and the orca must be re-released.
attributes.background: Forgeworld unjustly removed the orca model from their line, most of the people in the community want it back and action to bring it back needs to happen.
